description:
After I did my first video with Serge, I really, really wanted to get him into some male-on-male action so I could see a hot pair of lips wrapped around that huge Latin sausage of his.
So, I had Evan talk to him about it and after some convincing and a reassurance that he wouldn't have to reciprocate, he finally agreed.
Rudy had been wanting to do another video and after I showed him Serge's picture he was definitely in. We also got Tyler and David to join in the fun and we had Ray scheduled, but he canceled at the last minute (he said he wasn't ready yet).
The four of them showed up and as usual, the straight guys were real nervous and stiff (Serge especially). We got a pretty girl to strip down, sit off camera, and masturbate to give the guys inspiration. You can't really see her, but that's who the boys are looking at.
title: Suckfest 2
